message: Ah, the delusions.....

Great, we think they are Deplorable! So, now what? You going to swallow that? He was just kidding... He didn't mean it... Isn't the main reason you like Trump in the first place is because he speaks his MIND! To continue to enable and excuse his behaviour and his lies is really making yourself not worthy of any further consideration. You are below reprehensible, and your candidate is Deplorable and proves the depth of his pathology, he is not a good man.

I personally enjoyed the time with my son plus I love the snow so I guess I'm different! As long as the roads are safe for buses, schools should be open on time but if there are still roads that are icy, a 2 hr delay is appropriate. Safety must come first:)

Mackie has a point and we as Christians need to stop short of judging and remember the greatest commandment of all, to love one another...

Bernie is a democratic socialist, just like MLK, and he does not advocate socialism. He advocates ending the trillions in corporate tax breaks and loopholes for billionaires that are draining our economy and using that added revenue to invest in the middle class. The middle class is shrinking; we need big investment to create jobs and get people educated. Bernie is not beholden to corporations, he is fighting for us.
